heroText: This space contains a minimalist Social Network and a platform for sharing and graphical visualization of CSV, Excel and Json files.
card1Text: Social Feed - Post/comment/like + Excel & Csv to Chart/PDF + Data Visualizer + Public Data
card2Text: Free registration. No email verification required, frictionless with no imposed identity. Secure database.
card3Text: No data collection or exploitation. No ads or notifications.
card4Text: Agora is an MVP or prototype. Your feedback is welcome to co-build this space according to your needs.
